numlitem.para: Forward Overboard Valve is deactivated open,
Operation is limited to two Air Conditioning Packs,

Procedures are established and used to verify the forward lower lobe cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits,

For Freighter, procedures are established and used to verify main deck cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or Fly Away Kits,
For Passenger/Combi, one Lavatory/Galley fan is verified to be operative,
If installed, humidifiers are operated manually,
If installed, Fwd Cargo Heat (electrical) is deactivated, and
If installed, the main cabin exhaust valve(s) is deactivated closed.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.
UPS -400F's and BCF's do not have humidifiers or cabin exhaust valves.
The following EICAS message(s) may remain displayed:

numlitem.para: Forward lower cargo and Main deck cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to Pack selector "ESC MISC CARD INOP - USE TWO PACKS MAX". Placard adjacent to AFT Cargo Heat Switch "DO NOT OPERATE - LEAVE AFT CARGO HT OFF". Install placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel "FORWARD CARGO COMP HEATING SYS INOP". Enter items in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
